attributes.action: Increase school funding so that they can afford the resources they need.
attributes.additional_details: I am a primary school student. I have noticed that my school doesn't have enough money for what they have to do. Therefore they are having to ask the parents to pay for things like SAT homework books and are relying on the PTA to do more fundraising for basic equipment. I think this is wrong and the government should fund schools appropriately.
attributes.background: School resources our going up as is the cost of electricity and schools are finding it hard to afford all the equipment they need. Parliament need to increase the budget for schools so they can give a good education to all the students.
